title: Cause and effect of commercial economy 1450-1600

content.question:
Respond to parts A, B, and C.

Describe one reason for the growth of a commercial economy in Europe during the period 1450-1600.

Explain one effect of the growth of a commercial economy on politics in Europe during the period 1450-1600.

Explain one effect of the growth of a commercial economy on social structures in Europe during the period 1450-1600.

frqParts.text:
Respond to parts A, B, and C.

Describe one reason for the growth of a commercial economy in Europe during the period 1450-1600.

Explain one effect of the growth of a commercial economy on politics in Europe during the period 1450-1600.

Explain one effect of the growth of a commercial economy on social structures in Europe during the period 1450-1600.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
